sentence.Network_en: All Christendom makes merry at Christmas.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣诞节时整个基督教世界尽情欢乐.

sentence.Network_en: Rome was the greatest city in all Christendom.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗马是当时世界上最伟大的城市.

sentence.Network_en: During festival, in every country, Christendom all holds ceremonious souvenir ceremony.
sentence.Network_cn: 节日期间, 各国基督教徒都举行隆重的纪念仪式.

PerfectNetExp.abs: christendom 原位杂交, christendom 基督教欧洲, christendom 基督教大世界
christen 克里斯滕, christendom 基督教大世界, christendom 原位杂交

entry.tran: 基督教世界(指所有基督徒和基督教国家)
entry.def: All the Christian people and countries in the world can be referred to as Christendom .

means.word_mean: 1. the collective body of Christians throughout the world and history (found predominantly in Europe and the Americas and Australia);

sentences.sentence: "for a thousand years the Roman Catholic Church was the principal church of Christendom"

auth_sentence.content: Please speak for yourself instead of on behalf of all Christendom.

auth_sentence.content: If the new Christendom had a world capital based on the location of its believers, it would be somewhere south of the Sahara.
